sources.name: EMP_complex1
sources.script:
source(output(
		empno as string,
		ename as string,
		job as string,
		mgr as string,
		hiredate as string,
		sal as string,
		comm as string,
		deptno as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> EMP_complex1

sources.name: EMP_complex
sources.script:
source(output(
		empno as string,
		ename as string,
		job as string,
		mgr as string,
		hiredate as string,
		sal as string,
		comm as string,
		deptno as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> EMP_complex
